original_title: Después de… Primera parte: no se os puede dejar solos
overview: A history of the Spanish Transition told in first person by the main protagonists: on the one hand, the politicians, idealistic or merely opportunistic, who brought it to a successful conclusion in the tribunes and offices; on the other hand, the citizens who, in the streets, supported it sincerely or fought it with ferocity.
title: Después de… Primera parte: no se os puede dejar solos
